\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {X_i} && {Y_i} \\
	{\,} & X && {X \sqcup _{X_i}Y_i} && {\,} \\
	&&&& Y
	\arrow["{f_i}", hook, from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, dashed, from=1-4, to=2-2]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[curve={height=-18pt}, hook, from=1-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{e_i}"', hook, from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow["f", curve={height=18pt}, hook, from=2-2, to=3-5]
	\arrow[dashed, hook, from=2-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=1-2, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
